criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Kalikke has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Kalikke’s personal biases, one of Kalikke’s resistances, or one of Kalikke’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Kalikke has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Kalikke’s personal biases, one of Kalikke’s resistances, or one of Kalikke’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Kalikke is susceptible to flattery when actually Kalikke is resistant to flattery.
